body: Just wanted to make everyone aware that you will lose your exp and your rank if you decide to change names. Ivycode i am sure is working on a solution. If you really wanna change names now have some kind of proof so we know if you had a rank or not.
body_tagged: Just wanted to make everyone aware that you will lose your exp and your rank if you decide to change names. Ivycode i am sure is working on a solution. If you really wanna change names now have some kind of proof so we know if you had a rank or not.
title: Changing Names and Exp
